mapper.select: SELECT sa.*,sa.id as sa_id, sav.*,sav.id as sav_id, IF (skv.sku_id, 1, 0) AS isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.base_sale_attr_id = sav.base_sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id = sav.spu_id AND sa.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skv ON skv.sale_attr_value_id = sav.id AND skv.sku_id = #{skuId} ORDER BY sa.base_sale_attr_id, sav.id
